mapper.update: UPDATE resv SET resv_ask=#{resv_ask}, resv_fix=#{resv_fix} WHERE resv_no=#{resv_no}
mapper.select: SELECT r.resv_no, u.username, d.dog_name, ds.designer_name, i.item_name, r.resv_fix FROM resv r INNER JOIN user u ON u.useremail = r.useremail INNER JOIN dog d on d.dog_id = r.dog_id INNER JOIN designer ds on ds.designer_id = r.designer_id INNER JOIN item i on i.item_id = r.item_id ORDER BY r.resv_no DESC;
